resources.string: Match & Mix is a memory-puzzle game where you find matching number pairs while sliding tiles. Match all pairs to win!

• Each tile has 5 numbers in a cross pattern
• One space is empty, allowing tiles to move
• You have 5 chances to make matches
• Timer counts down during your turn

1. Memorize the numbers during preview
2. Click numbers to reveal them (2 at a time)
3. If numbers match, they stay revealed
4. If they don't match, they hide and you lose a chance
5. After a failed match, you must move a tile
6. Match all pairs before running out of chances

1. Create a lobby or join with a code
2. Both players must click "Ready to Play"
3. Memorize numbers during preview
4. Take turns finding matches
5. After a failed match, move a tile
6. First player to score 11 points wins
7. Each match = 1 point

• Remember number positions during preview
• Plan your moves carefully
• Use the empty space strategically
• In multiplayer, watch your opponent's moves
• Try to make matches quickly before time runs out
